CustomField.formula: (Payroll_New_Requisitions__c + Payroll_Approved_Requisitions__c + Payroll_Processed_Requisitions_Labour__c + Payroll_Paid_Requisitions__c ) - ( Payroll_New_Deductions__c + Payroll_Approved_Deductions__c + Payroll_Processed_Deductions_Other__c + Payroll_Paid_Deductions__c )
CustomField.label: Pay Total After Deductions
